name: Stickman Clash
description:
Here you can use all kinds of powerful and interesting weapons to fight, kill your enemies or use the Map to win!
Here you can also compete with your friends, or choose your favorite weapon to challenge your limits.
Happy, funny, exciting, unexpected!
You don't know what the outcome is for you, but you know that all you can trust is the weapon in your hands (or your feet), even though it may look like... Er... Not so much like a weapon... But rest assured, it can certainly help you win!
